comments.author: mozwilliamr@gmail.com
comments.creator: mozwilliamr@gmail.com
comments.text:
In some locales, the content in the checklist steps is overflowing the background image.

As a fix, Stas suggested changing the current background graphic of 3 narrow yellow boxes to one taller yellow box that can be repeated for each of the 3 elements. Then the height of each yellow box and be adjusted automatically to height of the string content.

Zach, could you help with this? Thanks!
comments.raw_text:
In some locales, the content in the checklist steps is overflowing the background image.

As a fix, Stas suggested changing the current background graphic of 3 narrow yellow boxes to one taller yellow box that can be repeated for each of the 3 elements. Then the height of each yellow box and be adjusted automatically to height of the string content.

Zach, could you help with this? Thanks!
